faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about {brand}
faqPage.noResults: No FAQs found matching your search.

whatIs.question: What is pdftheory?
whatIs.answer: pdftheory is a free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit that runs entirely in your browser. It offers 99 professional tools for editing, converting, merging, splitting, and securing PDF files without uploading them to any server.

isFree.question: Is pdftheory really free?
isFree.answer: Yes, pdftheory is completely free to use. There are no hidden costs, no premium tiers, and no registration required. All features are available to everyone.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: No, you don't need to create an account or register to use pdftheory. Simply visit the website and start using any tool immediately.

uploaded.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
uploaded.answer: No, your files are never uploaded to any server. All PDF processing happens locally in your browser using JavaScript and WebAssembly. Your files never leave your device.

safe.question: Is it safe to use pdftheory with sensitive documents?
safe.answer: Yes, pdftheory is designed with privacy in mind. Since all processing happens locally in your browser, your sensitive documents remain on your device and are never transmitted over the internet.

storage.question: What happens to my files after processing?
storage.answer: Your files are stored temporarily in your browser's memory during processing. Once you close the browser tab or navigate away, all file data is automatically cleared. We don't store any of your files.

operations.question: What PDF operations can I perform?
operations.answer: pdftheory offers 99 tools including: merge, split, compress, convert (to/from images, text, JSON), edit, annotate, sign, add watermarks, encrypt/decrypt, OCR, and many more.

merge.question: Can I merge multiple PDF files?
merge.answer: Yes, you can merge multiple PDF files into one. Simply use the Merge PDF tool, upload your files, arrange them in the desired order, and click merge.

images.question: Can I convert images to PDF?
images.answer: Yes, pdftheory supports converting various image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, BMP, TIFF, SVG, HEIC) to PDF. You can convert single or multiple images at once.

edit.question: Can I edit text in a PDF?
edit.answer: pdftheory provides annotation and editing tools including highlighting, adding text, shapes, images, and signatures. For full text editing, the PDF Editor tool offers comprehensive annotation capabilities.

browsers.question: What browsers are supported?
browsers.answer: pdftheory works on all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser for the best experience.

sizeLimit.question: Is there a file size limit?
sizeLimit.answer: Most tools support files up to 100MB, with some tools like merge and compress supporting up to 500MB. These limits are in place to ensure smooth performance in your browser.

slow.question: Why is processing slow for large files?
slow.answer: Since all processing happens in your browser, performance depends on your device's capabilities. Large files require more memory and processing power. For best results, close other browser tabs and applications.

offline.question: Does pdftheory work offline?
offline.answer: Currently, pdftheory requires an internet connection to load the application. However, once loaded, the PDF processing itself happens locally and doesn't require a connection.

supported.question: What languages are supported?
supported.answer: pdftheory is available in 9 languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, Portuguese, and Arabic (with RTL support).

change.question: How do I change the language?
change.answer: You can change the language using the language selector in the header. Your preference will be saved for future visits.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to reach out to us.

aboutPage.title: About {brand}
aboutPage.description: {brand} is a free, privacy-focused PDF toolkit that runs entirely in your browser. With {count}+ professional tools, you can edit, convert, merge, split, and secure your PDF files without ever uploading them to a server.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe that everyone should have access to powerful PDF tools without compromising their privacy or paying expensive subscription fees. That's why we created {brand} – a comprehensive PDF toolkit that puts your privacy first.
mission.p2: Unlike traditional PDF services that require you to upload your files to remote servers, {brand} processes everything locally in your browser. Your sensitive documents never leave your device, giving you complete control over your data.
mission.p3: Whether you're a student, professional, or casual user, {brand} provides all the tools you need to work with PDFs efficiently and securely.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your files never leave your device. All processing happens locally in your browser, ensuring complete privacy and security.

fast.title: Fast & Efficient
fast.description: Powered by modern web technologies, pdftheory delivers lightning-fast PDF processing without the need for uploads or downloads.

accessible.title: Accessible Everywhere
accessible.description: Available in 9 languages and works on any device with a modern browser. No installation required.

free.title: Free Forever
free.description: pdftheory is completely free to use with no hidden costs, no registration required, and no limits on usage.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Built with transparency in mind. Our code is open source, allowing anyone to verify our privacy claims.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Developed with feedback from users around the world. We continuously improve based on your needs.

technology.title: Built with Modern Technology
technology.description: {brand} is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure the best possible experience:

list.indexeddb: <strong1>IndexedDB</strong1> - For secure local storage of your work

technology.summary: This combination of technologies allows us to provide professional-grade PDF tools that run entirely in your browser, without any server-side processing.

cta.description: Explore our {count}+ PDF tools and see what {brand} can do for you.

nUpPdf.layoutVerticalDesc: Las páginas se apilan de arriba hacia abajo
nUpPdf.leftToRight: → De izquierda a derecha, luego ↓ hacia abajo
nUpPdf.successMessage: ¡PDF N-Up creado con éxito! Haga clic en el botón de descarga para guardar su archivo.

gridCombine.uploadDescription: Arrastre y suelte varios archivos PDF aquí.
gridCombine.successMessage: ¡PDFs combinados con éxito! Haga clic en el botón de descarga para guardar su archivo.
gridCombine.firstPageOnlyHint: Usar solo la primera página de cada PDF.
gridCombine.allPagesHint: Incluir todas las páginas de cada PDF en la cuadrícula.
gridCombine.fillModeHint: Cómo llenar celdas vacías cuando hay menos archivos que celdas.
gridCombine.previewInfoAllPages: {fileCount} PDF(s) con {totalPages} páginas en total se organizarán en una cuadrícula {layout} en {outputPages} página(s) de salida.
gridCombine.previewInfoFirstPage: {fileCount} PDF(s) se organizarán en una cuadrícula {layout} en {outputPages} página(s).
gridCombine.minFilesError: Por favor, añada al menos 2 archivos PDF para combinar.

alternateMerge.uploadDescription: Upload two or more PDF files to interleave their pages alternately.
alternateMerge.reorderHint: Drag and drop to reorder files. Pages will be interleaved in the order shown (1st page from file 1, 1st page from file 2, 2nd page from file 1, etc.).
alternateMerge.reverseSecondHint: Enable this for back-to-front scanned documents
alternateMerge.howItWorksDescription: Pages are interleaved alternately: Page 1 from File 1, Page 1 from File 2, Page 2 from File 1, Page 2 from File 2, and so on. If documents have different page counts, extra pages are appended at the end.
alternateMerge.successMessage: PDFs interleaved successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

combineSinglePage.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
combineSinglePage.previewInfo: {pages} pages will be combined into 1 continuous {orientation} page.
combineSinglePage.successMessage: Pages combined successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

addAttachments.pdfUploadDescription: Select the PDF file to add attachments to.
addAttachments.attachmentsUploadDescription: Select files to embed in the PDF. Any file type is supported.
addAttachments.pageRangeHint: Specify which pages to attach files to.
addAttachments.successMessage: Attachments added successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

editAttachments.uploadDescription: Select a PDF file to view and manage its attachments.
editAttachments.noAttachments: No attachments found in this PDF file.
editAttachments.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one attachment to remove.
editAttachments.successMessage: Attachments removed successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

comparePdfs.uploadDescription: Drag and drop or click to browse
comparePdfs.successMessage: Comparison complete! Use the view modes and page navigation to explore differences.

pdfToZip.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files to package.
pdfToZip.successMessage: Successfully packaged PDF files into a ZIP archive. Click the download button to save your file.

textToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop text files here, or click to browse.
textToPdf.successMessage: Text converted to PDF successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

txtToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop text files here, or click to browse.
txtToPdf.successMessage: Text converted to PDF successfully! Click the download button to save your file.
txtToPdf.textPlaceholder: Type or paste your text here...
txtToPdf.noTextError: Please enter some text to convert.
txtToPdf.noFilesError: Please add at least 1 text file.
txtToPdf.languageHint: Select languages used in your text for proper font support

jsonToPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a JSON file.

pdfToImage.uploadDescription: Arrastra y suelta un archivo PDF para convertir.
pdfToImage.pageRangeHint: Dejar vacío para todas las páginas
pdfToImage.skipFirstPageHint: La primera página (portada) se renderizará como imagen separada
pdfToImage.layoutHint: Combina múltiples páginas PDF en una sola imagen con el diseño de cuadrícula seleccionado.

pdfToSvg.uploadDescription: Arrastra y suelta un archivo PDF para convertirlo a SVG.
pdfToSvg.resolutionHint: Una mayor resolución produce archivos SVG más grandes y detallados.
pdfToSvg.pageRangeHint: Dejar vacío para todas las páginas
pdfToSvg.successMessage: ¡PDF convertido a SVG con éxito! Haz clic en las miniaturas para previsualizar o descargar archivos individuales.

pdfToGreyscale.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to convert to greyscale.

pdfToJson.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pdfToJson.successMessage: PDF extracted to JSON successfully! Click the download button to save your file.

ocrPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a scanned PDF file here, or click to browse.
ocrPdf.languagesHint: Select one or more languages for better accuracy
ocrPdf.successMessage: OCR completed successfully! Click the download button to save your file.
ocrPdf.infoText: OCR (Optical Character Recognition) extracts text from scanned documents and images. For best results, use high-quality scans and select the correct language(s).

linearizePdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop PDF files here, or click to browse. You can select multiple files.
linearizePdf.info: Linearization optimizes PDFs for fast web viewing. The first page will display before the entire file is downloaded, improving user experience for web-hosted documents.
linearizePdf.useObjectStreams: Use object streams for better compression
linearizePdf.useObjectStreamsDesc: Recommended for smaller file sizes. Disable for maximum compatibility with older PDF readers.

pageDimensions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
pageDimensions.showingFirst50: Showing first 50 pages. Download JSON for complete data.

removeRestrictions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a restricted PDF file.
removeRestrictions.ownerPasswordHint: If the PDF has an owner password, enter it here for better results.
removeRestrictions.info: This tool removes owner password restrictions that prevent printing, copying, and editing. It works on PDFs with permission restrictions but cannot remove user passwords required to open the document.
removeRestrictions.warning: Only use this tool on PDFs you own or have permission to modify. Removing restrictions from copyrighted material without authorization may violate copyright laws.
removeRestrictions.successHint: The PDF can now be printed, copied, and edited without restrictions.
removeRestrictions.invalidPassword: The password you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.

sanitizePdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to sanitize.
sanitizePdf.info: Sanitization removes potentially harmful content from PDFs, making them safer to open and share.

flattenPdf.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to flatten.
flattenPdf.info: El aplanado convierte elementos interactivos en contenido estático. Esto hace que el PDF no sea editable pero asegura una apariencia consistente.
flattenPdf.flattenFormsDesc: Convertir campos rellenables en texto estático
flattenPdf.flattenAnnotationsDesc: Combinar comentarios y resaltados en el contenido de la página
flattenPdf.flattenLayersDesc: Combinar todas las capas visibles en una sola

removeMetadata.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
removeMetadata.info: Removing metadata helps protect your privacy by stripping identifying information from the PDF.
removeMetadata.title: Title
removeMetadata.author: Author
removeMetadata.subject: Subject
removeMetadata.creator: Creator

changePermissions.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
changePermissions.privacyNotice: 🔒 Your passwords are processed locally and never sent to any server.
changePermissions.currentPasswordHint: Required if the PDF is already password-protected.
changePermissions.newUserPasswordHint: Users will need this password to open the PDF.
changePermissions.info: Note: Permission enforcement requires PDF encryption. Set an owner password below to enforce restrictions.
changePermissions.allowHighQualityPrintingDesc: Users can print at high resolution
changePermissions.allowCopyingDesc: Users can copy text and images
changePermissions.allowAnnotatingDesc: Users can add comments and annotations
changePermissions.allowFillingFormsDesc: Users can fill in form fields
changePermissions.allowAssemblyDesc: Users can insert, delete, or rotate pages
changePermissions.successHint: For full permission enforcement, encrypt the PDF with an owner password.
changePermissions.invalidPassword: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please check and try again.
changePermissions.passwordRequired: This PDF is password-protected. Please enter the current password to proceed.

fixPageSize.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here, or click to browse.
fixPageSize.scaleFitDesc: Scale content to fit within page, maintaining aspect ratio
fixPageSize.scaleFillDesc: Scale content to fill page, may crop edges
fixPageSize.scaleStretchDesc: Stretch content to fill page exactly

bookmark.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file to edit bookmarks.
bookmark.noBookmarks: No bookmarks yet. Click 'Add Bookmark' to create one.
bookmark.hint: Click a bookmark to preview its page. Use +/✎/× to add child, edit, or delete.

pageNumbers.uploadDescription: Arrastra y suelta un archivo PDF.
pageNumbers.differentModeHint: Este modo es útil para impresión a doble cara donde desea que los números de página estén en el borde exterior de cada página.

watermark.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
watermark.enterText: Please enter text for the watermark.
watermark.selectImage: Please select an image file for the watermark.
watermark.unsupportedImage: Unsupported image format. Please use PNG or JPG.

headerFooter.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here.
headerFooter.previewHint: Enter header or footer text to see preview

invertColors.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

backgroundColor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

textColor.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
textColor.thresholdHint: Adjust to control which pixels are affected
textColor.searchValuePlaceholder: Enter text to match or line numbers...

stamps.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file here.
stamps.instruction1: Click the Stamp tool (image icon) in the toolbar above
stamps.instruction2: Click "Add image" to upload your stamp image
stamps.instruction3: Click on the PDF where you want to place the stamp
stamps.instruction4: Drag to resize or reposition the stamp
stamps.instruction5: Click "Save Stamped PDF" below when done
stamps.viewerNotReady: Viewer not ready. Please wait for the PDF to load.
stamps.saveFailed: Failed to save stamped PDF. Please try again.

removeAnnotations.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

formFiller.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF form.

formCreator.uploadDescription: Arrastra y suelta un archivo PDF aquí.
formCreator.selectHint: Haz clic en un campo para seleccionar, arrastra para mover, usa la esquina para redimensionar
formCreator.addFieldHint: Haz clic en el PDF para agregar un campo {type}
formCreator.noFieldSelected: Selecciona un campo para editar sus propiedades, o usa la barra de herramientas para agregar nuevos campos.
formCreator.noFieldsYet: Aún no hay campos. Haz clic en el PDF para agregar campos de formulario.
formCreator.blankPdfNote: Se creará un PDF en blanco para agregar campos de formulario.
formCreator.templateHint: O elige una plantilla para comenzar rápidamente
formCreator.fieldLabelPlaceholder: Ingresa el texto de la etiqueta...
formCreator.flattenFormHint: Make form fields non-editable (converts to static content)
formCreator.saveNote: Projects are saved locally in your browser.
formCreator.shortcutsHint: Shortcuts: Ctrl+Z (Undo) | Ctrl+Y (Redo) | Ctrl+D (Duplicate) | Ctrl+A (Select All) | Delete (Remove)
formCreator.clickToAdd: Click on PDF to add field

removeBlankPages.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.

tableOfContents.uploadDescription: Drag and drop a PDF file.
tableOfContents.bookmarkRequired: This tool generates a clickable table of contents from existing PDF bookmarks. Please ensure your PDF has bookmarks before using this tool. You can add bookmarks using the Edit Bookmarks tool.

pdfToDocx.successMessage: Your PDF has been successfully converted to DOCX! Click the download button to save your file.
pdfToDocx.ocrDescription: Use this if your PDF contains scanned images of text. It will make the text editable in Word.

wordToPdf.uploadDescription: Arrastra un documento Word (.docx) aquí o haz clic para seleccionar.
wordToPdf.successMessage: ¡Tu documento Word se ha convertido a PDF con éxito!

pptxToPdf.uploadDescription: Arrastra un archivo PowerPoint (.pptx) aquí o haz clic para seleccionar.

djvuToPdf.successMessage: ¡Tu archivo DJVU se ha convertido a PDF con éxito!

deskewPdf.thresholdDesc: Higher values detect more subtle skew angles. Default: 10
deskewPdf.dpiDesc: Higher DPI provides more accurate detection but takes longer.

pdfBooklet.gridModeDesc: 1x2 is standard for booklets. Use larger grids to save paper.
pdfBooklet.previewDesc: This preview shows how pages will be arranged on each sheet.

rasterizePdf.pageRangeDesc: Leave empty to convert all pages.

markdownToPdf.gfmLabel: Enable GitHub Flavored Markdown (tables, task lists, etc.)
markdownToPdf.syntaxHighlightLabel: Enable syntax highlighting for code blocks

fontToOutline.preserveTextDesc: Keep the original text layer alongside the outlined version
fontToOutline.dpiDesc: Resolution for rasterized elements (higher = better quality, larger file)

hero.title: The PDF Solution for Modern Businesses
hero.description: Secure, scalable, and powerful PDF tools designed to streamline document management for your entire organization.

features.title: Everything your team needs to work faster
features.subtitle: Replace fragmented tools with one complete PDF solution.

security.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
security.description: ISO 27001 certified, GDPR compliant, and end-to-end encryption for all your sensitive documents.

team.title: Team Management
team.description: Centralized dashboard to manage users and permissions across your entire organization.

api.title: Powerful API
api.description: Automate document workflows by integrating our robust PDF conversion and editing API.

esign.title: E-Signatures
esign.description: Legally binding digital signatures to speed up contracts and agreements.

remote.title: Work from Anywhere
remote.description: Cloud-based access ensures your team stays productive whether in the office or remote.

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.description: Process thousands of documents in seconds with our high-performance bulk tools.

cta.title: Ready to upgrade your business workflow?

hero.title: Empowering Students & Teachers
hero.description: Simplify coursework, research, and grading with powerful PDF tools tailored for the classroom. Fast, free, and easy to use.

benefits.title: Tools for the Next Generation of Learners
benefits.description: Whether you're a student pulling a study all-nighter or a teacher grading dozens of papers, PDFTheory removes the friction of document handling so you can focus on learning.

list.noInstall: No install required - works on any library computer
list.mobile: Mobile friendly for studying on the go

essay.title: Essay Formatting
essay.description: Merge research and format citations effortlessly.

group.title: Group Projects
group.description: Share and comment on PDFs for easy collaboration.

textbooks.title: Digital Textbooks
textbooks.description: Compress large files to email assignments easily.

blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.subtitle: Discover tips, tutorials, and news about PDF tools and productivity

meta.title: Blog - PDFTheory
meta.description: Read our latest articles about PDF Theory tools, productivity tips, and tutorials.
